params.amount: Amount of tokens that are vested in atoms
params.curveType: Type of the curve that is used for the vesting
params.durationWeeks: The duration of the vesting in weeks
params.initialUnlock: Amount of tokens that are unlocked immediately in atoms
params.managed: Indicator if the vesting is managed by the pool manager
params.owner: The owner for which the vesting was created
params.startDate: The date when the vesting started (can be in the future)

returns.vestingId: Id of a vesting based on its parameters

vestingHash(address,uint8,bool,uint16,ui.notice: Calculate the id for a vesting based on its parameters.
